title: Message pane issue
content:
I'm running Thunderbird 115.4.3 (Supernova) (64-bit). Prior to the update to version 115, Thunderbird would show me the most recent messages each time I would click on the Inbox of an account.

But now, after the update to version 115, when I click on my default Inbox, Thunderbird shows me old messages from weeks or even months ago, and I have to scroll down to see the new messages.

I have four accounts in TB and three of the inboxes function correctly. It is just my main account which is not behaving correctly.

Please help. It's frustrating having to scroll down every time I switch between inboxes.
creator: mickreid99

title: Thunderbird updater
